title: What recommendations would you make to the Government on how pupils can be? Assisted in the following areas for the sake of maximizing the effective use of mobile Phones for educational benefits? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the USA the government doesn’t make policies for the schools. Each independent district in each state does that. Some individual schools within a district has separate rules for cell phones. Our district has Chromebooks for every student to use so they don’t really need their phones.
